title: [SOLVED]820-3476 no trackpad
message:
I have another one of those nightmare retina's where the trackpad is frozen. The voltage on the trackpad pin 1 PP3V3_TPAD_CONN is 1.56v, when I remove the trackpad cable it is 3.3v. So i replaced both the cable and trackpad but as soon as I connect the trackpad, the same happens! I also ran it without any other devices conncted (Battery, display, I/O board and SSD) but the same still happens. Any ideas? Board itself looks clean no liquid spils.

Edit: also tried another keyboard still freezes, keyboard works fine however, Apple OSD test says no issues found

title: [SOLVED]820-3476 no trackpad
message: What is the resistance value of R4808??

title: [SOLVED]820-3476 no trackpad
message: R4808 was off, I made a direct line with copper wire as its 0 ohm, working fine now :)
